text: Arrojadoa bahiensis is a species of plant in the family Cactaceae. It is endemic to Brazil. Its natural habitat is rocky areas. ==References== * Taylor, N.P. 2002. Arrojadoa bahiensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. title: Arrojadoa bahiensis
